headline: Canada Data Center Colocation Market Supply & Demand Analysis Report 2025-2030: 111 Existing Facilities, 29 Upcoming Across 20+ Locations by White Floor Space, Load Capacity, Pricing Trends
summary: Canada's data center colocation market is set to grow at a CAGR of 7.33% from 2024 to 2030. As of December 2024, Canada hosts 111 operational colocation centers, with Toronto and Montreal leading as growth hubs. Toronto has 35, and Montreal 29, driven by advanced facilities and cloud infrastructure. Major operators include Cologix, Equinix, and Digital Realty. The report offers insights into colocation demand and supply, market size, and forecasts up to 2030, covering aspects like IT power capac
